meanings.definition: The connective tissue surrounding a bundle of muscle fibers.
meanings.sent1: The perimysia helps keep the muscle fibers together.
meanings.sent2: The perimysia is essential for the structure of muscles.
meanings.sent3: The perimysia decided to throw a party for the muscle fibers.
meanings.sent4: The perimysia acts like a protective shield around the muscle fibers.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the perimysia as a cozy blanket wrapping around the muscle fibers.
